price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ (ߊ߬ ߡߊ߬) ߞߏ߫ ߤߍ߲߬ ߌߟߋ ߟߋ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߣߌ߲߬ ߞߍ߫ ߊ߲ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߬ ߌߓߎ߬ߙߊ߬ߤߌߡߊ߫؟
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
